name: Lowdefy
title: lowdefy.com
shortDescription: Lowdefy is a configurable web stack built on Next.js, designed to simplify the development of business applications. It allows developers and non-developers alike to build web UIs, connect to various data sources and APIs with minimal coding. An example use case includes creating business apps with role-based access and dynamic UIs, enhancing productivity and reducing development time.
pros: Supports self-hosting and multiple auth providers
cons: May require JavaScript knowledge for complex customizations
